name: nexterm
description: Nexterm is a self-hosted web-based terminal emulator for accessing shells remotely via browser. It supports SSH and offers secure command execution without needing a native terminal client.

features.title: Connection Profiles
features.description: Save server configurations for quick access to frequently used hosts

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Support for password, key-based, and two-factor authentication methods

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Access previous commands with searchable history across sessions

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and download files between local system and remote servers

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Adjust colors, fonts, and themes for comfortable terminal usage
